name: Into the depths below
description:
The mines beneath Trianis tempt adventurerers with the promise of danger, exitement and wealth. Though many already lost their lives you yet heed the call.
Create a party of up to five characters and explore the depths below!

Features:
- Create your party
Choose from 11 different classes, each wih dozens of unique skill trees and different mechanics. You can later add skill trees from other classes, allowing for
sheer endless viable party compositions.

- 12 long levels in four different biomes
The mines are of course only the beginning. Each new level brings new dangers and treasure, new random events and monsters to defeat.

- Gameplay focus
Less emphasis on story allows you to focus on dungeon delving. Experiment, find your favourite class combinations and press on.
However prepare to die a lot. The depths below are unforgiving and cruel.
